posts.author: mikethemarine
posts.title: Just got a NEW Terms & Conditions to use my bank/CU, I will be leaving them, It is run by a fucking teachers union
posts.content:
1. The following types of payments are prohibited through the Service, and we have the right but not the obligation to monitor for, block cancel and/or reverse such payments: Payments to persons or entities located in prohibited territories (including any territory outside of the United States); Payments that violate any law, statute, ordinance or regulation;

Payments related to: (1) tobacco products,

(2) prescription drugs and devices;

(3) narcotics, steroids, controlled substances or other products that present a risk to consumer safety;

(4) drug paraphernalia;

(5) ammunition, firearms, or firearm parts or related accessories;

(6) weapons or knives regulated under applicable law;

(7) goods or services that encourage, promote, facilitate or instruct others to engage in illegal activity;

(8) goods or services that are sexually oriented;

(9) goods or services that promote hate, violence, racial intolerance, or the financial exploitation of a crime;

(10) goods or services that defame, abuse, harass or threaten others;

(11) goods or services that include any language or images that are bigoted, hateful, racially offensive, vulgar, obscene, indecent or discourteous;

(12) goods or services that advertise or sell to, or solicit others; or

(13) goods or services that infringe or violate any copyright, trademark, right of publicity or privacy or any other proprietary right under the laws of any jurisdiction; Payments related to gambling, gaming and/or any activity with an entry fee and a prize, including, but not limited to casino games, sports betting, horse or greyhound racing, lottery tickets, other ventures that facilitate gambling, games of skill (whether or not it is legally defined as a lottery) and sweepstakes; Payments relating to transactions that (1) support pyramid or Ponzi schemes, matrix programs, other "get rich quick" schemes or multi-level marketing programs, (2) are associated with purchases of real property, annuities or lottery contracts, lay-away systems, off-shore banking or transactions to finance or refinance debts funded by a credit card, (3) are for the sale of items before the seller has control or possession of the item, (4) constitute money-laundering or terrorist financing; (5) are associated with the following "money service business" activities: the sale of traveler's checks or money orders, currency dealers or exchanges or check cashing, or (6) provide credit repair or debt settlement services; Tax payments and court ordered payments including but not limited to Alimony and Child Support.

In no event shall we or our independent contractors or other third parties to whom we assign or delegate rights or responsibilities be liable for any claims or damages resulting from your scheduling of prohibited payments. We have no obligation to research or resolve any claim resulting from a prohibited payment. All research and resolution for any misapplied, mis-posted or misdirected prohibited payments will be your sole responsibility and not ours. We encourage you to provide notice to us by the methods described in above of any violations of this section or the Agreement generally.

posts.raw_content:
The government of Argentina has already digitized the documents and they can be viewed on the official website of the General Archive of the Nation:

[https://www.argentina.gob.ar/interior/archivo-general-de-la-nacion/documentacion-sobre-el-nazismo](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/interior/archivo-general-de-la-nacion/documentacion-sobre-el-nazismo)

The text states, among other things: 

>*These records are the result of investigations carried out by the Foreign Affairs Directorate of the Federal Police, the State Intelligence Secretariat (SIDE) and the National Gendarmerie, between the 1950s and 1980s. The corpus involves more than 1850 documents gathered in 7 folders:*

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 1: Bornmann and Eichmann](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3771-1.pdf)

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 2: Bornmann, Eichmann and Mengele.](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3771-2.pdf)

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 3: Walter Kutschmann (Pedro Olmo)](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3771-3.pdf)

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 4: Miscellaneous documents](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3771-4.pdf)

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 1: Mengele](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3772-1.pdf)

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 2: Hess, Barbie, Schamberger, Roschmann and Wegner.](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3772-2.pdf)

[Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 3: Mengele, Pavlic and Bandrimer.](https://www.argentina.gob.ar/sites/default/files/agn-7-3772-3.pdf)
posts.author: sebster
posts.title: Documents about Nazis in Argentina have been digitized and are now available
posts.content:
The government of Argentina has already digitized the documents and they can be viewed on the official website of the General Archive of the Nation:

https://www.argentina.gob.ar/interior/archivo-general-de-la-nacion/documentacion-sobre-el-nazismo

The text states, among other things:

These records are the result of investigations carried out by the Foreign Affairs Directorate of the Federal Police, the State Intelligence Secretariat (SIDE) and the National Gendarmerie, between the 1950s and 1980s. The corpus involves more than 1850 documents gathered in 7 folders:

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 1: Bornmann and Eichmann

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 2: Bornmann, Eichmann and Mengele.

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 3: Walter Kutschmann (Pedro Olmo)

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 4: Miscellaneous documents

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 1: Mengele

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 2: Hess, Barbie, Schamberger, Roschmann and Wegner.

Documentation on Nazi presence in Argentina. Folder 3: Mengele, Pavlic and Bandrimer.

posts.author: icehole3
posts.title:
Rich Baris The People's Pundit:

Vote preference is the only true test of competence and trustworthiness in the polling industry.

If a pollster can't predict election outcomes and vote shares, no other finding can be considered credible.

quotedTweet.content:
Democrats are saying that Trumps approval is at its lowest and people hate him.

Yet that only happens if you include the pollsters who were horrifically wrong for the past 8 years.

twitter.content:
To quote @axlrose, "Sometimes I feel like I'm beating a dead horse."

Vote preference is the only true test of competence and trustworthiness in the polling industry.

If a pollster can't predict election outcomes and vote shares, no other finding can be considered credible.
